   contain the root `toctree` directive.

Welcome to unisolver!
=====================================

**unisolver** is a Python library for users that solve quadratic programming problems.
It includes solvers `Gurobi <https://github.com/Gurobi>`_ and `quadprog <https://github.com/quadprog/quadprog>`_
offers a *simple* and *intuitive* API with a *unified* format.

.. toctree::
   :maxdepth: 2

   usage

   user guide

   casestudy

.. note::

   This project is under active development.
